website_summaries.verdict: This hydrolyzed collagen powder includes 20 amino acids to benefit joint health, skin, hair, nails, tendons, and other connective fibers throughout the body.
pros: Mix into recipes, broths, coffee, etc
Some experience extra, unanticipated benefits in their hair color/thickness, weight management, acne disappearing, and even thyroid disease management
cons: As can happen, some users experienced abdominal pain/GI troubles with usage
Some people dislike the smell and/or taste

customer_reviews.title: Crazy how my hair has grown because of this product ...
customer_reviews.text: Crazy how my hair has grown because of this product. Also any wounds I have heal well and fast. I will continue to use this product in this picture the first one I wasn't taking it and my hair was dry and brittle. Second picture I had been taking it for at least 2 months my hair was healthy and strong. I have seen a big difference in my skin and nails too.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Tolliver

customer_reviews.title: Not the product i get from other stores
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I love this collagen and I've taken it regularly for some time now although this was the first time I've purchased it from Amazon and I do t think I will again. This container was less then half full and gummed up in my coffee. This is not typical of great lakes so.......
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Snowball

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing, but the first one I bought was way ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, but the first one I bought was way better!! The first one desolved immediately and I did not taste it. My skin and nails showed positive results immediately! I am super unhappy with the second can I purchased. Hopefully I can buy another can from the first distributer and have better results!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed and not for the better...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased and used about 5 canisters of this and the past 3 have tasted and smelled awful! I don't know what happened to the product I originally reviewed but I can no longer use this one. I have since switched to Sports Research Collagen Peptides and there's no scent or flavor at all.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, first I was a tad bit sceptical about the rave reviews this got, but I thought what the hell, why not. I just finished my first pkg. I really didn't notice anything for about a week. Then I noticed my hair and nails started growing pretty good. But the best part is my joints feel way better!!! My knees don't snap, crackle, or pop every time I get up. I just LOVE that I can't taste it!!!! I put 2 regular tbs in my coffee every morning. I've even put it in my hot tea and can't taste it. Thank you! I will be definitely ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy68

customer_reviews.title: Severe abdominal pain
customer_reviews.text: Severe abdominal pain when taking this product. I agree with past reviews. If you have IBS or sensitive stomach, steer clear of this. I was so hopeful to reduce joint pain. I am 50 years old and have already had one total hip replacement this year and scheduled for the other side in 2 months due to hip dysplasia and severe degenerative joint disease. I have tried everything including dietary change to reduce the pain. This product is not worth the stomach pain. I will go back to making my own bone broth!
customer_reviews.author: Kelp

customer_reviews.title: I tried once a day and the results aren't as good. I've even got my mother hooked on this ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this for almost a year now and I refuse to live without it. The claims that it helps diminish your cellulite is absolutely correct! I'd say the cellulite on my thighs has improved 80% without exercise, but you have to use this twice a day as suggested. I tried once a day and the results aren't as good. I've even got my mother hooked on this stuff when she saw my results. As far as wrinkles....I'd say if helps, but you still need to do other things for prevention and upkeep of course. I wouldn't say this is Botox in a bottle at all. By hair and nails have also benefited from this product
customer_reviews.author: Tonisha

customer_reviews.title: Lead
customer_reviews.text: I read another review about lead content and it scared me so I did some reading. EPA regulates drinking water to be less than 15 ppb (parts per BILLION) lead. Great Lakes has levels in parts per MILLION. And before you think, "but I consume less collagen than water by volume" the difference between ppb and ppm is HUGE. Vital Proteins does not allow any measurable amount of lead in their collagen. I will purchase that from now on. Unfortunately it is more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jerkysticks

customer_reviews.title: Different taste when product purchased through the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I love the effect of this collagen, it does reduce joint pain quickly. I was surprised to discover a really strong smell and taste - I added it to my morning coffee and could not drink it. Had to dissolve in a very small amount of liquid to get it down. Oddly enough, I ordered a 6-pack directly from the manufacturer since benefits do outweigh the bad taste, and that lot has absolutely no taste! The product purchased from Amazon was not expired, not sure why such a drastic difference.
customer_reviews.author: DKP

customer_reviews.title: ... two of these especially for my husband who has bad knees, I thought I would take it also ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these especially for my husband who has bad knees, I thought I would take it also with all of the raving reviews, every body is different as we all know, my husband is fine, but I broke out with horrible acne after only 2 weeks and I am 66 years old and don't have acne normally. It also has caused daily headaches, so I stopped but my husband has continued so hopefully he will continually get better as for me I feel much better not taking it, now the stupid acne is going away!
customer_reviews.author: ShirleyH.

customer_reviews.title: Just try it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had less pain since I started using this product. My skin looks great and my hair is growing like crazy and very thick. I'm 46 and I feel very young.
customer_reviews.author: Linda McDougal

customer_reviews.title: Not just "new" packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I know they have changed the packaging on this but they had to of changed the content as well. I've used this for a long time but when I received this one in the "new" packaging it had a horrible taste to it and didn't dissolve as it had previously. I had always mixed it into my coffee every morning as it dissolves best in warm/hot liquids, but this new can was overwhelmingly different. I ended up throwing this one away. I hope the company reads these comments because there is definitely something different about this other than just the outside packaging!
customer_reviews.author: MOB

customer_reviews.title: Cleared Back Pains
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I heard great things about it from my doctor. Even though I really haven't been using it, my husband has. Before I bought it he would complain of back pains. He would take muscle relaxers, saw a chiropractor, and received many massages lol. But nothing helped. He started taking this after the reviews we read together and a few days later.. no back pain and he hasn't had any since!!
customer_reviews.author: Stevii Brixx

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased beyond hope that within 3 days the throbbing from ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the previous reviews that it helped especially with knee joint pain. I was pleased beyond hope that within 3 days the throbbing from tendonosis and arthritis in my right knee literally went away and has stayed away 3 weeks later. It hasn't fixed my loss of cartilage (yet) that resulted in a bone on bone condition, but without the pain I can now get to work on strengthening the knee as a whole. If I coul;d rate it higher than 5 STARS I would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BAD BREAKOUTS
customer_reviews.text: I was so hoping to experience a decrease in arthritis pain and stiffness with this product. But instead it made me break out in a horrible cystic acne not just my Facebook my chest and my back as well. This does dissolve in water just fine and there’s no taste really, but unfortunately the breakouts were immediate and lasted for quite some time even after I stop taking the product.
customer_reviews.author: Just a girl from PNW

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to sneak protein into your diet
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this gelatin several times. It has no flavor and doesn't change the texture of what you add it to. I love it for a quick way to get extra protein in my coffee or smoothies. Grassfed & clean. What more could you ask for? I wish I had known about this product years ago. It would be fabulous for pregnant moms trying to get their 100+ g of protein daily. My midwife recommended this exact brand & product to me; she uses it in her coffee as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: rashes on face and arms
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd review on this product, I don't know what happened to the first one. This is my 4th or 5th cans of this product but the last one gave me bad rashes on my face and arms. I was trying to return it but Amazon won't let me and this is the message "This item isn't eligible for return." I was thinking, if the collagen that I've received came from a bad/old batch and returning or exchanging is not possible, then it does not matter if they sell old or expired or new because returning or exchanging is not possible. Where is the consumer protection or who governs this seller for selling things that make people sick?
customer_reviews.author: EnLir

customer_reviews.title: Saw no benefit.
customer_reviews.text: After using a canister every 3-4 weeks for eight months, I can truthfully say I haven't noticed a thing. I still have gut issues, even after removing those top food allergens. My hair isn't any thicker, the color isn't darker, and it doesn't grow any faster. My nails are still brittle with lots of ridges. My skin looks the same (60 year old skin is wrinkled and stays wrinkled). At best, I have helped support Great Lakes to the tune of $300+ dollars. I gave this three stars because I neither dislike (2 stars) nor hate (1 star) the product. It's just meh.
customer_reviews.author: Lv2Read

customer_reviews.title: price and quality
customer_reviews.text: So, I discovered that if you buy this product from Great lakes website they give you discounts. I was paying $25,00 for a 16 oz container. Guess what? If you order from GLG, which I did, I got two 16 oz containers for $37 with their coupon code!!! And free shipping guys!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice on joints but had skin react
customer_reviews.text: This collagen does Make my joints feel better. But, it makes my skin break out with red patchy spots. I have tried it 3 times and every time I get spots
customer_reviews.author: J. Giuliano

customer_reviews.title: Makes my thinning hair not so thin
customer_reviews.text: My hair has been thinning and I started taking this daily for about 3 weeks and I can already see the difference. I take 2 TBSP with 1 TBSP of Metamucil fiber. You are suppose to take it twice a day but I've only been taking it once. It's tolerable to drink since it works.
customer_reviews.author: HEM

customer_reviews.title: BAD batch!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this product regularly for years. In fact have recommended to many, even last week. This most recent batch is BAD. I could tell it was different when I opened it this morning. Then I tasted it in my tea as I've done most mornings for the past year or more. It usually doesnt have a taste but this batch tastes fishy. It tastes very BAD when usually it doesn't​ even have a taste.
customer_reviews.author: MarkBthom

customer_reviews.title: The product is not the same...
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering this collagen for a while and was very happy with the quality, however the one I just got tastes awful, has different consistency and is yellow when dissolved ( usually it should be clear). Also, it doesn't say "pasture raised" anymore. I couldn't find it anywhere in the product description, nor on the top of the package where it usually was.
customer_reviews.author: ,sebastien

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years and have loved it, but this batch was terrible. The color and texture of the powder was different (not as fine, more yellow than white), it left a oily residue on the top of my coffee and it tasted savory. I’ve never been able to tell it was in my coffee, but it was noticeable when I used it this time (added one tablespoon to my morning Cup of coffee, as usual).
customer_reviews.author: Plate craft

customer_reviews.title: LIVER PROBLEMS DOWN THE ROAD
customer_reviews.text: It does work but I am now suffering from liver problems and nothing is helping. I work for the medical industry and thought I was making a good choice. The benefits do not outweigh the problems. I also got a recall from the FDA recently on it.
customer_reviews.author: L.Barc

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't the main reason I was taking this, but within 2 weeks I saw noticeable growth in my eyelashes - a nice bonus. I recommended to a friend, and she got complete relief from her knee pain due to cartilage damage.
customer_reviews.author: eva

customer_reviews.title: I would not sugest use if you have thyroid issues ...
customer_reviews.text: I would not sugest use if you have thyroid issues. Made my tiny nodule the size of a golf ball.
customer_reviews.author: Kandee kelly

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my diet
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped me recover from workouts quicker. I have gone a few days without it and noticed a big difference. I like that it is low in calories, affordable and easy to use. I put it in my oatmeal or coffee. It mixes better with things that are warm. Great for women trying to watch calories, no crazy side effects
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Moore

customer_reviews.title: Can half full, looks like corn meal!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this product several times and will not buy it from this seller or Amazon anymore. Something’s changed, as my most recent container had a weird yellow grainy consistency, wouldn’t dissolve like other cans did, and the container itself was only half full! Where did the rest of the product I paid for go, and why does it look like half a can of corn meal? Angry I can’t return or exchange!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: YAY
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for a couple weeks but in that time we took a 2500 mile road trip. Normally, getting out of my he car after riding for several hours was a challenge but I noticed this trip was no problem...I'm thinking it's the collagen.... Update.....been taking it for 3 months and just recently discovered that taking it before bedtime greatly improves my sleep. I've been an insomniac for years and tried many natural products over the years. Most make me groggy the next day...however, this lets me get some deep sleep and wake up refreshed. Just tried it on my daughter who doesn't sleep well either and she slept 12 hours straight last night! Woo Hoo!
customer_reviews.author: Gma Helen

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the difference this has made. I have lupus and I honestly can't recall the last time I could make a tight fist with no pain or climb the stairs with no knee pain. I am on my third day taking the gelatin collagen and I have no pain in my hands, knees, back. I never thought I would feel like this again. I did experience bowel over activity the first day but it was gone after the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Helen F Vajgert

customer_reviews.title: Help You Look Younger and Feel Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product. I have been using this product since July 2016. I receive compliments that I look great for my age. I've been asked what am I doing. My secret is this product. For all the stress that I'm dealing with, I still get compliments. People think I'm 7-10 years younger than my actual age. I work out three times a week and I don't have any achy joint issues. I believe by taking this collagen product, it is helping me.
customer_reviews.author: Judy F.

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product constantly. It's a must buy. It's kosher. It has made my hair thicker and longer and it has done the same with my nails. Those were added benefits. I take it to heal damage from toxins, improve my gut lining and add some filling factor to foods (soups) and drinks. I've never had any issues with this product or the ordering process. I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica44h

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome !I put it in my coffee every morning 2 tablespoons and it has made my hair grow back my nails are growing and they're strong and my skin looks wonderful. I have a thyroid disorder and I don't absorb protein very well but in this form my body absorbs it well it's tasteless, so I don't taste anything bad in my coffee it's nice to have my hair growing back with my scalp not showing anymore it took about six months for this to work I drink it every day! It would also be good in a "protein drink" . I'll be buying this for life!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: it works but....
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product a lot bought it monthly, but did the formula change? it supposed to be tasteless but now i hate the taste & weird after taste. This weird nasty taste is from the recent new labeled container. whatever has been changed change it back, don't fix something that was already a great product. i noticed that the ingredients used to say 100% Hydrolyzed collagen powder (from bovine hide) & now it only says hydrolyzed collagen.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Hair fuller and Thicker
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to help with my hair. It was damaged from all the dying and bleaching I've done to it. I've been using this product and let me tell you its amazing! I love it! Been using it for over 3 months and my hair if fuller, thicker, longer and healthier. For years I wasn't able to get my hair as I had it when I was in high school. Ever since I started using this product everyone always complimenting what did I do to my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product seems to be very helpful for my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be very helpful for my skin. Gives it a healthy look and glow. I've even gotten comments from others and noticed when I stopped for a bit. I don't notice any real change in my joints. The product has a difficult (strong) after taste, but I'm adjusting. I was using in a shaker at first, but I found it simply stirs in water. I use a minimal amount of water, so I can drink it down fast! It took almost one whole one to notice results. Now I'm on my fourth container and ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: djor

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little slow, but the product isn't!
customer_reviews.text: One day, to my surprise, I noticed that my nails were long and strong. Huh. Very unusual for me! Thyroid health and the daily grind usually prevent that. Another day, my reflection showed softening skin and plumpening wrinkles. Also, a pleasant surprise! Another day I realized my "bald patches" near my hairline were thickening up. Then it finally hit me - maybe it's the collagen! So I ordered a second can. But while I waited for it to arrive, I broke 4 nails! If you found this review HELPFUL, please click the button below. THX!
customer_reviews.author: 1PickyWoman😋

customer_reviews.title: Never again from amazon
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this for years from amazon and it's always been great and helpful to my skin/joints after one serving. The latest container however smells terrible- like a super strong chemical smell. I made myself take it twice at night and each morning i woke up with severe joint pain and feeling terrible. The opposite of what it used to do. It's not returnable here and that's just not ok! I purchased from another vendor and see if that one is ok. William never purchase this again from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made my eyelashes grow! They are longer than they have ever been! :)
customer_reviews.author: ~me

customer_reviews.title: What has happened to this?
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is horrible. I have been buying it for several years, and this canister is absolutely awful. Seems like the product has completely changed. It is like a bunch of fine, tasteless filler rather than gelatin. It does not dissolve in my coffee at all, which it always has. It stays in a huge lump at the bottom of the cup. I wasted 25.00, since no refund is possible. Hmm! Makes me wonder! Never again! I wouldn’t even feed it to the birds. Who knows what is in it. My advice is to buy from a reputable vitamin store and see if the product is different. I threw this in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.text: I agree withe the post by Kristi Howell. This product is different when you purchase on Amazon. It does have a nasty foam and is clumpy when mixed. I bought this same product at the health food store near me recently, opened the contents and compared it with the contents of the one purchased on Amazon and there was certainly a visible difference. Plus when I mixed the one that I purchased at the store in my coffee, it mixed perfectly and no foam or clumpy issues . I’m so angry that all this time I’ve been buying an inferior product from Amazon and it’s clearly not the same product. Feel very cheated!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Battista

customer_reviews.title: NOT GELATIN
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for more natural gelatin but I ruined two recipes that I’ve made many’s times before cause it doesn’t set up like gelatin. This should not be called gelatin at all. After contacting the company about this they would not give me a refund. Also they didn’t apologize.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah H.

customer_reviews.title: This used to be 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th or 5th container of Great Lakes Gelatin - Collagen Hydrolysate Kosher - Unflavored Protein - 16 oz. The previous containers were 5 stars. No flavor, no odor, dissolved easily. This container however, has a very strong odor, especially after added to liquid, hot or cold, has a strong, unpleasant flavor, and becomes weirdly gelatinous and does not dissolve nicely. I am hoping this is an anomaly and not the future norm. At $24 per container I am loath to throw this out, so I will struggle through and finish this one (just barely opened). If the following container is also unpalatable, I will be looking for a different collagen product.
customer_reviews.author: Patience

customer_reviews.title: Actually works really well.
customer_reviews.text: Both dad and I love this stuff. My medical friend also uses it and he is super picky about what vitamins and supplements he takes. I vet all that stuff through him now. It helps with joint issues and dad says his knee feels way better when he's taking this consistently. It has no actual taste so you can mix it into any drink you want. I use orange juice or a smoothie (it will make it a bit thicker of course). UPDATE: I've been adding it to my coffee and it's fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel S.

customer_reviews.title: I have thick hair!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for over a year and didn't think it was doing much but ago of a sudden a few months ago I realized how thick my hair is! I have baby fine hair and although my stylist said I have a lot of hair it always felt so thin like I didn't have much. It's a noticeable difference when I'm washing it or putting up in a pony tail. My nails are also pe pretty long and a bit stronger though they could still use some improvement. I put two spoonful in a coffee cup then pour in my coffee, no stirring needed. Zero flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting Taste
customer_reviews.text: I had previously finished a container of what I thought was this brand. So, I purchased a new canister of the Great Lakes Collagen Hydrosylate from Amazon. What a difference! The last can had little or no flavor at all. This one tastes absolutely disgusting! I have tried mixing it with stronger flavored liquids, adding spices, honey, etc. It does mix well, but the smell and taste are really hard to tolerate! I decided to return it, but can't do it! Just great...that's a lot of money down the toilet. Maybe I will see if my cats will eat it.
customer_reviews.author: debi w

customer_reviews.title: It's a miracle!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this brand for 5 months and I swear it has helped with all my joint pain- at 50 and have started feeling pain in knees- shoulders and hip area- especially after working out or sleeping- GONE!!! All GONE!! It took about 2 months for me to notice it significantly- I almost stopped but everyone kept telling me 2-4 months- give it time - I add it to my coffee and tea- dissolves instantly- I don't taste it and can't smell it
customer_reviews.author: Evi

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell and taste
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on if it helps my skin, nails, hair etc as can't stomach drinking it! I can smell and taste it, it tastes weird and creamy. I have a sweet tooth so it's not a nice sweet cream flavoring. I've added it to coffee and managed to drink the coffee but made the coffee less enjoyable. I added it to a smoothie today and threw out the smoothie as it made it disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Side effects
customer_reviews.text: This product was not for me. I took it for 2 weeks total. It was though easy to drink and dissolved nicely in my morning black coffee with no taste. After 2 days of this, I developed acne on my lower cheek that didn't really go away. It also messed with my menstrual cycle and I was 10 days late (always on time like clockwork). Also, a weird side effect, I felt this extra energy like euphoria everyday when taking this that lasted 6 hours or so, not necessarily a good thing. Maybe it messes with serotonin/tryptophan??! Overall, it just messed with my system too much to see any benefit.
customer_reviews.author: LonniDB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The first canister I bought was great. Mixed in smoothly. This canister is horrible. Lumpy, gummy, a layer of soggy powder in the bottom of the cup no matter how much I stir. I don't know what the change is, but this canister is horrible. Even a shaker cup doesn't work. There are still clumps and lumps. Doesn't matter if it is hot or room temp liquid.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Terrible migraines!
customer_reviews.text: I am doing the AIP diet. I added this to my regime and suffered awful headaches each of the 8 days I consumed it. I was also extra anxious and my clear skin went crazy with acne. It finally dawned on me that it was the collagen. I stopped taking it and haven't gotten a headache since. I can't return the collagen or get a refund. I'll never take this stuff again. I suffered so much those 8 days.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Brown

customer_reviews.title: Flavorless, Dissolves Eeasy, Works.
customer_reviews.text: I tried some other brand Collagen Hydrolysate and it tasted like burned hooves. This stuff is completely flavorless. It also dissolves quickly. Great for smoothies. Research has shown that our bodies can take gelatin or collagen hydrolysate and incorporate it directly into tendons and cartilage. Other research in rat models (unethical to damage human tendons) shows that supplementing collagen combined with vitamin C helps speed tendon repair. So all you athletes out there should add this to your regular routine and potentially heal faster.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Schopp

customer_reviews.title: Caused gastric distress
customer_reviews.text: Product has changed - I have been using this brand of collagen on a daily basis since the spring. The texture has changed from a fine soft grain to coarse and sandy in appearance and texture. This most recent purchase caused a lot of intestinal issues. The problems all went away as soon as I stopped taking it. Will not buy this collagen again.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Cowish.
customer_reviews.text: There IS a smell... I do not taste it much in my coffee, but it changes the flavor. I take it every AM in my coffee and feel like I have not had a single pimple pop up for 2 weeks now, about 4 weeks into using this. I am 40 and have occasional breakouts that used to require me to use Retin-A, but I have not used it once. I did not expect this. It may be a coincidence, and it may not be. Of course I feel like my nails are growing faster and my hair is growing too.
customer_reviews.author: Richele

customer_reviews.title: Amazing self-care product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. Collagen does amazing things for the body inside and out. I've noticed scars disappearing, wounds and pimples healing faster, and my skin in general looks younger and healthier. I sleep like a rock since taking it and feel much better during the day. I'm 26 but having a stressful job and not eating the healthiest (or enough) has started to show in how I look and feel. Seeing these results is inspiring me to be more mindful of how I treat myself. I will take a tablespoon of this per day forever.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust the expiration date on Great Lakes Collagen Hydrolysate
customer_reviews.text: This Great Lakes Collagen Powder product I received from Amazon had a light yellowish tan color with a sticky texture and a slightly rancid odor and similar mild taste. The product expiration date was in a year, so I trusted that was the nature of the product. I've since purchased the same product from a local grocer and it is a fine white odorless and tasteless powder. Amazon won't allow me to return this item because it's past the return time. Not sure what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Looking for sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Makes nails/hair grow but may cause some tummy problems
customer_reviews.text: Been using for almost 2 weeks now and while I have not seen any big changes, my husband has. He says his nails and ear/nose hair is growing like crazy, so much that he is having to trim twice in a week instead of just ince. He also experienced a stomach ache when using this so I have stopped putting in his coffee. So yes this really does aid in nails and hair growth but may cause some digestion problems for some. I have not had any problems but also have not experienced any phenomenal changes. Will update when the can is empty.
customer_reviews.author: S. McCombs

customer_reviews.title: My favorite collagen powder!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this collagen a couple times, and as others have noted, the most recent batch was definitely more yellow and less fine of a consistency. But it still dissolves easily and doesn't seem to have a stronger taste or smell. I put it in my coffee and smoothies. I can't say I've had dramatic improvements in my skin or joints, but I enjoy the product as a protein source. I'm trying to be more consistent taking this daily and I'll update my review after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Plain Jane

customer_reviews.title: Just what my body needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for joint pain. After seeing a chiropractor and a massage therapist every two weeks for two years I was still suffering with neck and back pain. A client told me about this product so I gave it a try. I have been taking it for a week now and WOW!! My pain has diminished greatly. I haven't had to take advil for pain in a week. I am able to sleep through the night without waking up in pain. I will be telling all my family and friends about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless and desolves a little better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my coffee every day. Nobody wants sludge, goop, or an off-taste in their treasured morning cup of coffee, and you cant tell this product is in there. No taste is important to me. It also dissolves reasonably well. I have been buying this for over a year and happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hyper Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Hair growth!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this in my morning tea after recommendation from a doctor after tearing my hamstring tendon. I was really surprised to find that my hair started growing faster and thicker and my nails got a bit stronger. I also noticed a bit that my skin is brighter but that was not as evident to me as my hair. I have always had a tough time with weak and thin hair so I will keep taking this for that reason alone as I've never found anything to help it grow such as this.
customer_reviews.author: Al Pal

customer_reviews.title: I struggled with digestive issues for months. When I ...
customer_reviews.text: I struggled with digestive issues for months. When I started taking just 1 tbsp every morning with my coffee, it cleared up almost instantly! This stuff has healed my gut- I am so so thankful I found it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Preferred collagen supplement
customer_reviews.text: This is my second type of collagen that I've tried and I like this one much more. This one dissolves totally in my morning coffee and leaves no funky after taste. I was hoping to see increased hair growth, although I haven't noticed much in that way yet. However, my joints are feeling better so I suppose that's morning important. Will stick with this brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a long time. I just received a can and it was so discussing tasting.....sour and foul. It left a numb like feeling on my tongue. After that I will be searching for a replacement from a different company for this.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the prior version Much better!
customer_reviews.text: Prior to this new version of the collagen unflavored powder I LOVED the product! It mixed Very well without clumping and I could put it in the refrigerator to get it nice and cold. The new version just purchased this month, Jan 2019, does not mix as well. When I took it out of the refrigerator to drink it was a solid mass. I tried it at room temperature thinking I did something wrong; I even put in less than half the recommended amount.... came out clumpy and a very thick texture that was not exactly palatable. Again, the older version I give 5 stars!! This new version only 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: PDBS

customer_reviews.title: Great Lakes helps my aching joints.
customer_reviews.text: After using Great Lakes Gelatin for several months and noticing dramatic improvement in the condition of my "bad" knee and other painful joints, I switched to another brand which offered more product for just a little more money. Within a week I noticed the pain had returned. I continued to use the other brand of collagen for a few weeks to see if the pain went away but it didn't. I went back to Great Lakes and within three days my joints started to improve.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower.

customer_reviews.title: by far my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite brand of collagen. It melts in my coffee with very little effort, its not clumpy or sticky. It has helped my knees so much and the benefits of course to skin/hair/nails. It is tasteless, and does what it's meant to do. I really love the great lakes brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shannypick

customer_reviews.title: GLG Collagen
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product for three days, 2 T. twice a day as directed, and it gave me the most awful gas I've ever had in my entire life! There was no scoop in the container either. I was thinking of cutting it back to half the amount but why bother? Even if that cuts the gas in half, it's still hard for me to live with myself much less subject others to it. I was going to return it but found that it's "not eligible for return". What's up with that? Where in the world does it state that on the page? Beware.
customer_reviews.author: LiebJosi11

customer_reviews.title: Must have miracle product. Best supplement I have ever purchased, by far.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product- I am a mom of two boys under 3 years old, and had a lot of post partum hair loss. My hair is thicker than ever now. I have long hair (waist length) and have noticed significantly less fall out. I am also having to trim my (strong, thick) nails 3-4x per week. I have noticed the skin on my face looks plumper, especially around my eyes. Reminds me of how it looked about 10 years ago (when I was 18.) my skin also seems to heal faster when I get minor scrapes, scratches, blemishes, etc. Definitely recommend this product to anyone, especially those suffering from hair loss, brittle nails, or dull skin.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Katherine Webb

customer_reviews.title: Up your protein intake and help support healthy joints
customer_reviews.text: My trainer recommended this to up my protein intake. She mentioned that it also helped her knees when running marathons. I’m not a marathon runner so I didn’t think much about the last part. However, I was surprised and ecstatic when my wrists quit hurting after I started including this in my shakes. I have been unable to do push-ups and other exercises that are weight bearing on the wrists for the last 2 years. Lots of doctors and no solutions. I am still in shock - adding this to my diet has truly been a game changer. My wrists no longer hurt!
customer_reviews.author: TX-CJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My acupuncturist recommended a collagen supplement for me and specifically suggested the Great Lakes brand in the green can! There are so many positive benefits of adding collagen to your diet, from improved joint health to natural anti-aging ingredients. I have been taking for 6+ months and notice an overall improvement. There is a definite peculiar flavor to this collagen, undescribable but noticeable. My routine is to mix two tablespoons in 16 ounces of hot water and add a splash of lemon to cover any taste. Read the product description, reviews and talk to your physician, then make your own informed decision. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tr@cie

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add to my smoothies in hopes I would see a boost in the effects of collagen in my skin. I am over 50 and beginning to see some facial sagging. I have already used one canister and have bought a second. I'm not sure if my facial sagging has improved, but I can definitely see a difference in the hardness of my nails. It did not take long before I saw that they are thickens ing a bit. I'm pleased with that as I have had thin nails my whole life. Jury is still out as to whether this will have an effect on the elasticity of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMarTay

customer_reviews.title: ... joints in my hands were becoming increasingly stiff and painful. The improvement in mobility and pain relief is ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 48 and started taking this about 3 weeks ago because arthritis runs in my family and the joints in my hands were becoming increasingly stiff and painful. The improvement in mobility and pain relief is nothing short of amazing. I have told everyone that will listen about this stuff. My husband started taking it after he noticed how the swelling in my hands has gone down. They look much better too. Instead of dry and scaly they look dewy and soft. I just sent my mother in law a can for her stiff shoulder and just ordered an 8 lb bag for home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apparently A BAD BATCH
customer_reviews.text: Tastes and smells terrible. I've tried to tolerate it and I just can't. Amazon won't allow me to return it and it hasn't even been 30 days. I've used this brand for a few years now. I doubt I will ever buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: decr8r

customer_reviews.title: Wow, no more joint pain
customer_reviews.text: I had meniscus surgery several years ago on left knee and was compensating on my right knees which is causing swelling and pain. So I decided to try this product. As soon as I got it, I started taking it and the first day I felt a difference I’m my knee. After four days no need pain! I will continue to use this product! Will recommend having fewer joint pain and. Noticing more hair grow and stronger nail. I’m 56 and and enjoying the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my skeletal pain
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second can and have my third in reserve. Before using this powder, I have on and off lower back pain from a misaligned vertebra, knee pains, on and off plantar fasciiatis and some hip pain when walking. After a few days of taking 2 rounded tbls (recommended 2x a day) I became aware that my pains were gone. I continued on one serving a day mixed in my Atkins Zero Calories fruit flavored drink. No pain. I stopped for a few days and the pains returned. I'm back on it, still only once a day and can definitely tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Ward

customer_reviews.title: A Great Addition!
customer_reviews.text: I put two tablespoons in my Post Workout Smoothie and I was blown away! I felt like I ate two big macs! LOL I don't feel this full when I add my flaxseeds. I left them out this morning and I'm impressed. There are 6 grams of protein in my flaxseeds but a lot of fiber and there are 11 grams of protein in two tablespoons of this Collagen. I bought this product, because my hair fell out and has been growing back slowly. I also have a fine line under one eye that I hope will diminsh. I hope this speeds up the process. At 53, I need all the help that I can get.
customer_reviews.author: Wrightn221

customer_reviews.title: Take your daily dose ! :)
customer_reviews.text: It took a few drinks to get used to it, but I told myself, "hey, that's the flavor of Jell-o!" and that seemed to make it less weird! I try to double up and put all 4 tablespoons into a large glass of cold water, and it does take more time to dissolve -- there are little wisps, sort of like egg-drop soup left behind for a while. Keep stirring, they'll dissolve eventually! I've been drinking it everyday , and giving it to my old arthritic dog -- I'll definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: RRabago

customer_reviews.title: My gray hair has diminished!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am doing the Keto diet. I have been using it for a few months. I had not dyed my hair in two months and I was still not noticing so much gray. I thought it was my imagination. A friend told me she is also taking collegen and she noticed that she has fewer gray hairs too. This was before I mentioned my observations. So, I guess it was not my imagination. I love the product. I make keto "smoothies" with sugar free jello, low carb dairy mix (like yogurt), and the collagen powder.
customer_reviews.author: dewdrops7

customer_reviews.title: Seeing improvements after 3 cans
customer_reviews.text: Finally seeing improvements in joints after three cans of this stuff. I don't like the taste of it, though. The only drink I've put it in where I can't taste it is coffee, so I've taken to drinking a cup of decaf every morning with 2.5 scoops of this. (I don't use the full dosage of two scoops twice a day - this stuff is too expensive for me to do that). I suddenly started having trouble with many joints "slipping" in and out of place. It's not happening nearly as often now. I haven't noticed any benefits on skin/hair, but definitely helping the joints.
customer_reviews.author: E. White

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I've finished my first container. It took me about 3-weeks to finish using 2 tablespoons in the morning & 2 tablespoons at night. My skin is absolutely glowing. I've always had nice skin, a beautiful complexion; no blemishes, no spots, no acne, etc. However, I used tinted moisturizers to give me more of an even tone and finished look. I 'NOW' have stopped using the tinted moisturizers as this product gives my skin a beautiful glow, so needless to say, I don't need to use those anymore. I've also noticed that my skin feels tighter, over my entire body. I really love this product. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ivory

customer_reviews.title: I heard great reviews. Well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother, because she needed something besides prescriptions to help her with her joints. Mom was involved in a accident, and was in pain. Because I was so worried for mom, I ordered this product. I heard great reviews. Well, it has been three months, and my mom works out and walks. Mom is 70 years old, and loves this product. Mom said that she immediately feels better after she takes this. Mom said that her joints and entire body feels great, after taking this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to really love this product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really love this product. It's does not have a flavor but it gives me a really bad case of gas. I tried to hang in there to give my system time to get adjusted but it was the same results for 3 days in a row. I didn't take that much and I missed it with ACV, Honey, Lemon and water.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know this is supposed to have anything to do with pain relief, until I started to write this review. I have no idea if it's helped with my pain because I take so many things for pain. I do know my hair and nails grow like crazy when I'm using this everyday. It takes a while before that starts happening though. I also really like how it mixes into any liquid easily, without clumping, and has no taste at all, so you can drink it in water. This is the only collagen/gelatin I order anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Strangely, my nails end up chipping and breaking off with this collagen brand
customer_reviews.text: This product does the opposite of what it should every time I consume it. I notice every time, within a couple days of taking even half the recommended amount - just one scoop - my nails end up CHIPPING and breaking off! Don't know why this is, and ignored it in the past thinking there was no connection. I was wrong. Recently restarted taking this for hair benefits, and again the chipping and breaking off nails. This product is too expensive to reorder with these side-effects. Will not re-purchase again, and not sure whether I will even finish the canister that I have.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased. I take this every day and have noticed ...
customer_reviews.text: It does seem to have a slight taste if I just dissolve it in orange juice (or something similar). However, in smoothies (or something with a stronger taste or thicker consistency) I can't taste it at all. It does dissolve completely in cold or hot liquids (it does take a while sometimes, as is to be expected). On the whole, I'm very pleased. I take this every day and have noticed a slight decrease in my migraines. It's not a miracle cure, but it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Best collegan for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Blends almost instantly. Doesn't clump like peptides do. Absolutely no taste, so my tea still tastes the same with 3 scoops. Using this product for my mental health. *update* Ben using for 2 months now and really nice a difference in my brain fog, but have also changed some of diet, including dropping coffee for Matcha. My skin is clearer and less porous. My hair and nails are stronger and healthier. Cannot imagine not starting my off without my Matcha tea and collegan.
customer_reviews.author: Groovytune

customer_reviews.title: I can sleep!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a premature review as I have only been using this for about a week. What I noticed immediately is that I am now sleeping through the night. This is unheard of for me. In reviews I had read prior to purchasing, being able to sleep was mentioned. I thought it was worth a try for this alone. I am so pleased! The other noted benefits will be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: I am not positive but, I have seen a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not positive but, I have seen a correlation to lack of weight loss when using this product. After reading some other reviews, I may see a correlation to joint pain and red spottiness on my face. Just a heads up in case others may have noticed the same. I do believe I've had issues with too much calcium in the past, so this may be a reason...But, for what it's worth, i have never seen a benefit to taking this product and I have given it a fair try on many different occasions.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Potential Allergic Reactions
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product and used it every day for about 40 days. Have not noticed any benefits to date but have experienced some potential bad side effects. The first day I used it I ended up in ER with a swollen tongue. I was prescribed oral steroid for 5 days. Throughout 40 day usage had several migraines and ended up back in ER this week with severe swollen cheek and mouth. I was again prescribed oral steroid and scheduled for allergy testing. I'm not sure if these reactions were due to the product but this is the only thing I have changed/added to my diet since the issues began.
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Joint, hand and back pain?
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this collagen powder. The benefits and reviews were promising. I used it for two weeks and started having weird symptoms. Back pain, carpal tunnel and other joint issues. I am 28 and have never had any of these issues. After not taking the collagen powder for 2 days the issues went away. Will be trying to return this since it obviously doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Swills100

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this faithfully all summer long; I add it to my morning protein shake and for the first time in my life, my nails are hard and look as beautiful as nails I had always wished for..............our son recommended this for me and it does everything it says it does and more; so glad that I found this product. It has worked on aches and pains to some point and it's not a magic bullet if that's what you seek but coming from a 59 year old woman................this stuff is absolutely worth adding to your daily regimen!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Crummett

customer_reviews.title: BAD SMELL & MADE ME SICK
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this!!! When I opened the container it had a bad smell. I gave it a try anyway and it made me sick. There was no way to get in touch with the company or to return the item. I'm very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not tasteless
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a nutritionist to help my alarmingly thinning hair. I’ve used up one container of it in about a month, putting 2 scoops in 16 ounces of water once a day, and I can’t say I’ve seen any improvement so far. It also is not tasteless- it has a weird taste and smell- but I chug it down because I’m so hoping for results. I’ll use the second container I’ve bought and decide after that if I’ll continue with it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi Feiner

customer_reviews.title: Colla-CAN
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty rad. I found it through Rhonda Patrick the most notorious woman doctor/scientist in the world. I think it's worth using a few times a week for health reasons but I'm also still a 28 year old with some gray hairs so, in that regards I'm just screwed.. Will continue to use so that if for some reason when I'm 110 years old being interviewed on "whats the secret to longevity" I will at least have something to claim other than maryjane.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Effective product for reducing pain associated with inflammation and arthritis.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a miracle cure , but it has reduced the intensity of pain I have had with arthritis , and with bone issues. It doesn't eliminate the pain but definitely reduces the intensity. And this is the reason I am using this product with a diagnosis of Osteoporosis. I use this twice a day. I mix it with some water to dissolve it, and then pour that into a half glass of juice and stir. It dissolves easily and there is no taste nor does it have that thick texture you get with other gelatins on the market. It has become a permanent addition to my health plan, and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B

customer_reviews.title: Every body needs this
customer_reviews.text: I got my mom hooked on this after trying it. Now we both can't go without it! Blends great with an immersion blender and coffee, or I just spinkle it in things like cottage cheese, French toast batter, scrambled eggs, etc. and don't tell my family...my son wonders why his arms don't hurt after drumming and my husband thinks he no longer has arthritis. EVERY body needs this.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Collagen Review
customer_reviews.text: Started with the orange label, couldn't get past the taste. Ordered the green label hydrolyzed and even though I still get an aftertaste, I was it down with something like a good cup of coffee afterward. Know it's going to help with my osteoporosis (don't want to take the meds doc would like to start me on)...so trying natural ways to build bone and this is part of my regime. I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nannette

customer_reviews.title: Good, but no noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my coffee/tea to add a little protein, and collagen. To be honest though I can’t tell much of a difference. That said I do suffer from hypothyroidism and other related hormone balances, and until those are resolved I probably won’t see much improvement in skin elasticity and hair growth. May be good for gut health/leaky gut syndrome.
customer_reviews.author: LowCarbLivin

product_meta.title: Great Lakes Gelatin, Collagen Hydrolysate, Unflavored Beef Protein, Kosher, 16 Oz Can
feature_bullets: COLLAGEN HYDROLYSATE: Made of ONE simple ingredient, collagen is a dietary supplement with a beneficial combination of amino acids. At Great Lakes Gelatin Company, we believe that a healthy lifestyle and a balanced diet, including collagen, is the cornerstone to a life well lived
HEALTH BENEFITS: Supports joint health and aids in post-workout recovery*
BEAUTY BENEFITS: Promotes healthy skin and supports strong hair and nails*
DIRECTIONS: Easily dissolves in your favorite beverages such as coffee, tea, juice or a smoothie. It can also be added to foods like soup, yogurt or oatmeal
QUALITY: Grass-Fed & Pasture-Raised, Keto-Certified, Paleo-Friendly, Gluten Free, Kosher, Non-GMO
